    • Constructor Detail

      • DetailWindow

        public DetailWindow()
        Create a new window, in which a chart with the most recent data is displayed, both as a chart, and in a table. View is modelled in tabs. Data can be toggled on and off the chart.

    • Method Detail

      • addCheckBoxes

        private void addCheckBoxes(WeatherObservations observations,
                           org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart chart)
        Adds checkbox's for the fields dynamically to the graph.
        Parameters:
        observations - the observations, required to get list of fields that can be graphed.
        chart - the chart object being passed to the toggle function.

      • addFieldToGraph

        private void addFieldToGraph(Field field,
                             org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart chart,
                             WeatherObservations observations)
        Adds the field in question to the graph, and adds the plot line renderer.
        Parameters:
        field - field to be added
        chart - chart in which the field is being added
        observations - context of Weather Observations being added to the graph.

      • addListener

        public void addListener(java.awt.event.WindowListener l)

      • buildFavouritesButton

        private javax.swing.JButton buildFavouritesButton(WeatherStation station)
        Method to create the button to add or remove from the favourites list. Dynamically creates the label for the button depending on the stations existence in the favourites list.
        Parameters:
        station - handle on the station object being operated on
        Returns:
        new JButton to add or remove from favourites.

      • buildHistoryContainer

        private javax.swing.JTabbedPane buildHistoryContainer()
        Method to create tabs to contain both teh graph and table data.
        Returns:
        The tabbed JPane.

      • buildRefreshButton

        private javax.swing.JButton buildRefreshButton(WeatherStation station,
                                               ObservationsProvider provider)
        Create button to check if the current data is the most recent available.
        Parameters:
        station - the WeatherStation object, provides handle on object.
        Returns:
        button which is then added to the correct JPanel

      • buildTable

        private javax.swing.JTable buildTable(WeatherObservations observations)
        Takes the WeatherObservation object, and creates and populates a JTable with the most recent data.
        Parameters:
        observations - The iterable list of weather observations.
        Returns:
        the populated table, which is added to the appropriate JPanel.

      • populateDataSetIndex

        private void populateDataSetIndex(WeatherObservations observations)
        Populates a HashMap of integers, where the key is the name of the field. Used for adding and removing items from the graph.
        Parameters:
        observations - gives list of fields to graph.

      • removeFieldFromGraph

        private void removeFieldFromGraph(Field field,
                                  org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart chart)
        Removes field in question from the graph.
        Parameters:
        field - the field to be removed
        chart - the graph which the field is being removed from

      • setChartPanelAttributes

        private void setChartPanelAttributes(org.jfree.chart.ChartPanel chartPanel)
        Method of disabling non-applicable functions from JFreeChart.
        Parameters:
        chartPanel - the chart equivalent of a JPanel, for use with JFrame.

      • setFavouritesListener

        public void setFavouritesListener(FavouritesUpdatedListener l)

      • show

        public void show(WeatherStation station,
                 ObservationsProvider provider)
        The method that deals with the Java Swing context. All containers are cleared and populated with fresh data.
        Parameters:
        station - The WeatherStation for which data is displayed
        provider - An asynchronous way of retrieving the WeatherObservation data

      • toggleFavourites

        private void toggleFavourites(WeatherStation station,
                              javax.swing.JButton button)
        Method for toggling the favourites button between either Adding to Favourites, or Removing from Favourites.
        Parameters:
        station - handle on the station object being operated on.
        button - handle on the favourite button

      • toggleGraph

        private void toggleGraph(javax.swing.JCheckBox box,
                         Field field,
                         org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart chart,
                         WeatherObservations observations)
        Decides whether the action adds or removes the field, depending on its current state. Will not allow user to remove all items from the graph.
        Parameters:
        box - The checkbox being checked. Required to stop user from removing ALL values from graph
        field - the field being toggled
        chart - the graph the field is being added or removed to/from
        observations - list of observations being added/removed.

      • updateChart

        private void updateChart(org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart chart)
        Checks if chart has been initialised. Avoids Null Pointer Exceptions.
        Parameters:
        chart - the chart object, used for graphically displaying the data

      • updateTimeSinceLastRefresh

        public void updateTimeSinceLastRefresh(long millis)
        Shows time since the last JSON was downloaded.
        Parameters:
        millis - the number of milliseconds elapsed
